mapper.insert: insert into gg_baqryxx (ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, RYBH, RYXM, ZJLX, RY_SFZH, XB, MZ, CSRQ, NL, XZDXZ, DAFS, RYLY, RY_ZAYMC, R_RSSJ, RYLX, MJ_SFZH, R_SFYZJB, R_YZJB, R_SFSSJC, R_SSMS, R_SJTSTBTZ, R_SFZS, R_ZSSS, C_RYQX, C_CSSJ, C_CSYY, SFYWP, SFTSQT, TSQT, RYZT, C_SFYZJB, C_YZJB, C_SFSSJC, C_SSMS, C_SJTSTBTZ, C_SFZS, C_ZSSS, SFZBXM, ZBDW_BH, ZBDW_MC, LXDH, HJD_XZQH, HJDXZ, GYZT, ZHDD, SIGNNAME, RY_ZAYBH, JSLXDH, JSGX, GJ, TBSJ, ZPID, XZD_XZQH, SFSFBM, GZDW, BM, CH, CYM, WHCD, ZZMM, DAFS_TEXT, SFTB, BAQSYQKBH, SFYTHCJ, XSYS, AQJCKSSJ, AQJCJSSJ,JQBH,AJBH,MJ_XM,DWXTBH,sfznbaq,ssclid,ZHSJ,ZHDXZQH,ZHDXZQHMC,sswpzt,ckzkzpid,xgbs,shzt, sjbq,r_sfyj,rtbj,xb_mj_sfzh,xb_mj_xm,yytj,ssms, register_code,sf) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rySfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xzdxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dafs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryZaymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rRssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rylx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mjSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rSfyzjb,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rYzjb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rSfssjc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rSsms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rSjtstbtz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rSfzs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rZsss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cRyqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cCssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cCsyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfywp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sftsqt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tsqt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cSfyzjb,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cYzjb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cSfssjc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cSsms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cSjtstbtz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cSfzs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cZsss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfzbxm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zbdwBh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zbdwMc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hjdXzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hjdxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gyzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryZaybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jslxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jsgx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xzdXzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfsfbm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gzdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dafsText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sftb,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baqsyqkbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfythcj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xsys,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{aqjckssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aqjcjssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mjXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwxtbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfznbaq,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{ssclid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zhsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{zhdxzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhdxzqhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sswpzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ckzkzpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgbs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjbq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{rSfyj,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{rtbj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xbMjSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xbMjXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yytj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ssms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sf,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update gg_baqryxx set ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_FLAG = #{dataFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
XGR_SFZH = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()), BAQID = #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAQMC = #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYBH = #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYXM = #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RY_SFZH = #{rySfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XB = #{xb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MZ = #{mz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSRQ = #{csrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NL = #{nl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, XZDXZ = #{xzdxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAFS = #{dafs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYLY = #{ryly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RY_ZAYMC = #{ryZaymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, R_RSSJ = #{rRssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RYLX = #{rylx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MJ_SFZH = #{mjSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, R_SFYZJB = #{rSfyzjb,jdbcType=INTEGER}, R_YZJB = #{rYzjb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, R_SFSSJC = #{rSfssjc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, R_SSMS = #{rSsms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, R_SJTSTBTZ = #{rSjtstbtz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, R_SFZS = #{rSfzs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, R_ZSSS = #{rZsss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_RYQX = #{cRyqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_CSSJ = #{cCssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, C_CSYY = #{cCsyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFYWP = #{sfywp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SFTSQT = #{sftsqt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TSQT = #{tsqt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYZT = #{ryzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_SFYZJB = #{cSfyzjb,jdbcType=INTEGER}, C_YZJB = #{cYzjb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_SFSSJC = #{cSfssjc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, C_SSMS = #{cSsms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_SJTSTBTZ = #{cSjtstbtz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, C_SFZS = #{cSfzs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, C_ZSSS = #{cZsss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFZBXM = #{sfzbxm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZBDW_BH = #{zbdwBh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZBDW_MC = #{zbdwMc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LXDH = #{lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HJD_XZQH = #{hjdXzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HJDXZ = #{hjdxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GYZT = #{gyzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHDD = #{zhdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGNNAME = #{signname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RY_ZAYBH = #{ryZaybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSLXDH = #{jslxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSGX = #{jsgx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GJ = #{gj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TBSJ = #{tbsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZPID = #{zpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XZD_XZQH = #{xzdXzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFSFBM = #{sfsfbm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GZDW = #{gzdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BM = #{bm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH = #{ch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CYM = #{cym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHCD = #{whcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZZMM = #{zzmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAFS_TEXT = #{dafsText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFTB = #{sftb,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BAQSYQKBH = #{baqsyqkbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFYTHCJ = #{sfythcj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, XSYS = #{xsys,jdbcType=CHAR}, AQJCKSSJ = #{aqjckssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AQJCJSSJ = #{aqjcjssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JQBH = #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AJBH = #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MJ_XM = #{mjXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DWXTBH = #{dwxtbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sfznbaq = #{sfznbaq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ssclid = #{ssclid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHSJ = #{zhsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZHDXZQH = #{zhdxzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHDXZQHMC = #{zhdxzqhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sswpzt = #{sswpzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ckzkzpid = #{ckzkzpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xgbs = #{xgbs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shzt = #{shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjbq = #{sjbq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, r_sfyj = #{rSfyj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rtbj = #{rtbj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xb_mj_sfzh = #{xbMjSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xb_mj_xm = #{xbMjXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yytj = #{yytj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ssms = #{ssms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_code = #{registerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sf = #{sf,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select * from gg_baqryxx
1=1 and ISDEL=0
and BAQID='${baqid}'
and BAQMC='${baqmc}'
and DWXTBH = '${zbdwBh}'
and DWXTBH like '${likezbdwBh}%'
and RYXM LIKE '${ryxm}%'
and BAQSYQKBH LIKE '%${baqsyqkbh}%'
and RY_SFZH='${rysfzh}'
and XB='${xb}'
and TSQT like '%${tsqt}%'
and RYZT ='${ryzt}'
and RYZT !='${ryzts}'
and RYLX='${rylx}'
and C_RYQX = '${cRyqx}'
and C_CSYY ='${cCsyy}'
and RYBH='${rybh}'
and RY_ZAYBH='${ryzaybh}'
and HJDXZ like '${hjdxz}%'
and DAFS='${dafs}'
and MJ_SFZH='${mjSfzh}'
and R_RSSJ >='${rssj1}'
and R_RSSJ <='${rssj2}'
and C_CSSJ is null and (R_RSSJ + '1D') >= '${cjkssj}' and (R_RSSJ + '1D') <= '${cjjssj}'
and C_CSSJ >='${cssj1}'
and C_CSSJ <='${cssj2}'
and CSRQ >='${csrq1}'
and CSRQ <='${csrq2}'
and SFYTHCJ='${sfythcj}'
and ryzt != '${sfcs}'
and ajbh = '${ajbh}'
and SFZNBAQ = '${sfznbaq}'
and yytj = '${yytj}'
and MJ_SFZH in
'${item}'
and ryzt in
'${item}'
and rybh in
'${item}'
and lrsj >= to_timestamp('${lrsjStart}','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and lrsj <= to_timestamp('${lrsjEnd}','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and ((XGSJ::timestamp)::date - ('${checkDate}'::timestamp)::date = 0)
and DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},2),'%')
and DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},4),'%')
and DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},6),'%')
and DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},8),'%')
and MJ_SFZH = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from gg_baqryxx where baqid = '${baqid}' and baqsyqkbh like '${bh}%' and isdel = 0 order by lrsj desc limit 1
select * from gg_baqryxx where isdel = 0 and rybh = (select rybh from chas_yw_ryjl where ryzt = '1' and wdbh_l = '${wdbhL}' and isdel = 0)

select baqryxx.* from gg_baqryxx baqryxx,chas_yw_ryjl ryjl where baqryxx.rybh = ryjl.rybh and ryjl.wdbh_l = '${wdbhL}'
and baqryxx.dwxtbh like '${sysCodeLike}%'
and baqryxx.ryzt = '04' and baqryxx.c_ryqx in ('01','04') and baqryxx.isdel = 0 and ryjl.isdel = 0 order by baqryxx.c_cssj desc limit 1

select count(*) from gg_baqryxx where baqid = '${baqid}'
and ryzt = '${ryzt}'
and isdel = 0

select baqry.*,ryjl.ywbh as ywbh_ryjl from gg_baqryxx baqry left join chas_yw_ryjl ryjl on baqry.rybh = ryjl.rybh where baqry.isdel = 0 and ryjl.isdel = 0
and baqry.DWXTBH = '${zbdwBh}'
and baqry.R_RSSJ >='${rssj1}'
and baqry.R_RSSJ <='${rssj2}'
and baqry.RYZT ='${ryzt}'
and baqry.RYXM like '${ryxm}%'
and baqry.ywbh = '${ajbh}'
select * from gg_baqryxx where ry_sfzh = '${sfzh}' and ryzt = '01' and isdel = 0 limit 1
select * from gg_baqryxx where rybh = '${rybh}' and isdel = 0 limit 1

select * from gg_baqryxx
1 = 1 and isdel = 0 and rybh = '${rybh}'
and baqid='${baqid}'
limit 1

select * from gg_baqryxx
1 = 1 and isdel = 0 and ry_sfzh = '${sfzh}'
and baqid='${baqid}'
limit 1

select ry.*, (select wdbh_l from chas_yw_ryjl jl where ry.rybh = jl.rybh and jl.isdel = 0 limit 1) wdbh, (select count(*) from chas_yw_nj nj where ry.rybh = nj.rybh and isdel = 0) urine, (select count(*) from gg_tjdj dj where ry.rybh = dj.rybh limit 1) tjzt, (select cl_number from chas_yw_clsyjl cjl where cjl.isdel = 0 and cjl.rybh = ry.rybh and cjl.bindstat in('1','2') limit 1) sycphm from gg_baqryxx ry
1=1 and ry.ISDEL=0
and ry.BAQID='${baqid}'
and ry.BAQMC='${baqmc}'
and ry.DWXTBH = '${zbdwBh}'
and ry.DWXTBH like '${likezbdwBh}%'
and ry.RYXM LIKE '${ryxm}%'
and ry.BAQSYQKBH LIKE '%${baqsyqkbh}%'
and ry.RY_SFZH='${rySfzh}'
and ry.XB='${xb}'
and ry.TSQT like '%${tsqt}%'
and ry.RYZT ='${ryzt}'
and ry.RYZT !='${ryzts}'
and ry.RYZT in
'${item}'
and ry.RYLX='${rylx}'
and ry.C_RYQX = '${cRyqx}'
and ry.C_CSYY ='${cCsyy}'
and ry.RYBH='${rybh}'
and ry.RY_ZAYBH='${ryZaybh}'
and ry.HJDXZ like '${hjdxz}%'
and ry.DAFS='${dafs}'
and ry.MJ_SFZH='${mjSfzh}'
and ry.R_RSSJ >='${rssj1}'
and ry.R_RSSJ <='${rssj2}'
and ry.C_CSSJ >='${cssj1}'
and ry.C_CSSJ <='${cssj2}'
and ry.CSRQ >='${csrq1}'
and ry.CSRQ <='${csrq2}'
and ry.SFYTHCJ='${sfythcj}'
and ry.ryzt != '${sfcs}'
and ry.ajbh = '${ajbh}'
and ry.SFZNBAQ = '${sfznbaq}'
and ry.yytj = '${yytj}'
and (ry.ryxm like '${likequery}%' or ry.ry_zaymc like '${likequery}%' or ry.mj_xm like '${likequery}%')
and ry.MJ_SFZH in
'${item}'
and ry.ryzt in
'${item}'
and ry.rybh in
'${item}'
and ry.lrsj >= to_timestamp('${lrsjStart}','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ry.lrsj <= to_timestamp('${lrsjEnd}','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and ((ry.XGSJ::timestamp)::date - ('${checkDate}'::timestamp)::date = 0)
and ry.DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},2),'%')
and ry.DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},4),'%')
and ry.DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},6),'%')
and ry.DWXTBH LIKE CONCAT(left(#{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},8),'%')
and ry.MJ_SFZH = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select (select count(*) from gg_baqryxx where ryzt = '01' and isdel = 0 and dwxtbh = '${sysOrgCode}') zsry, (select count(*) from gg_baqryxx where dwxtbh = '${sysOrgCode}' and isdel = 0 and r_rssj >= date_trunc('day',now()) -interval '1d' and r_rssj <= date_trunc('day',now()) -interval '1 second') zrrs, (select count(*) from gg_baqryxx where ryzt = '04' and isdel = 0 and dwxtbh = '${sysOrgCode}' and c_cssj >= date_trunc('day',now()) -interval '1d' and c_cssj <= date_trunc('day',now()) -interval '1 second') zrcs, (select count(*) from gg_baqryxx where ryzt = '06' and isdel = 0 and dwxtbh = '${sysOrgCode}') lscs
select bq.* from gg_baqryxx bq , chas_yw_ryjl jl where bq.rybh = jl.rybh and jl.wdbh_l = '${wdbhL}' and bq.isdel = 0 and jl.isdel = 0 order by bq.lrsj desc limit 1

select * from gg_baqryxx ryxx where rybh in(select jl.rybh from chas_yw_ryjl jl where jl.cwg_id in (select distinct xg.sb_id from chas_xt_sswpxg xg where exists ( select cwg_id from chas_yw_ryjl jl where jl.rybh in ( select rybh from gg_baqryxx ry where ry.baqid ='${baqid}' and ry.ryzt != '04' and ry.isdel = '0') and jl.ryzt = '1' and jl.isdel = '0' and xg.sb_id = jl.cwg_id) and xg.sbgn = '1'))
